title: Trade & U.S. Payrolls
itunes:title: Trade & U.S. Payrolls
description:
Kevin spoke with Marc Ross, founder of Caracal Global, and Matt Brooks, Republican strategist and Executive Director of the Republican Jewish Coalition. They discussed job numbers, trade talks between the U.S. and China, the 2020 election and Brexit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
